file_insights.changes_summary: Added comprehensive keyboard navigation and focus management to dropdown menu components

patterns_discovered: Context-based state management for dropdown interactions
Dynamic ref registration for menu items
Keyboard event handling with modular approach
gotchas_discovered: Need to manage focus index across different menu states
Handling edge cases like Home/End key navigation
Ensuring proper tab and escape key behaviors
Managing refs dynamically for menu items

key_achievements: Implemented Escape key to close menu
Added ARIA attributes for improved accessibility

recommendations: Consider extracting keyboard navigation logic into a reusable hook
Add unit tests for keyboard interaction scenarios
Ensure consistent keyboard navigation patterns across similar components
